content: For release on delivery   10:00 a.m. EST   November 13, 2018         What Are We Learning about Artificial Intelligence in Financial Services?    Remarks by   Lael Brainard   Member   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   at    Fintech and the New Financial Landscape   Hosted by the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, the Federal Deposit Insurance  Corporation, University of Pennsylvania Wharton School of Business, Bank Policy Institute, and   Brookings Institution    Philadelphia, Pennsylvania      November 13, 2018
